security_audit.summary: This skill contains only markdown documentation and illustrative JavaScript pseudocode templates. No executable scripts, file system access, network requests, environment variable reads, or external command execution. All JavaScript shown is for documentation purposes only and would need to be implemented by the host AI system.

content.user_title: Assess task complexity and enforce quality gates
content.value_statement: AI agents often proceed with unclear requirements or overly complex tasks, leading to wasted effort and suboptimal solutions. This skill provides systematic complexity scoring, gate validation checklists, and escalation workflows that prevent agents from proceeding without sufficient context.
actual_capabilities: Assess task complexity on a 1-5 scale based on lines of code, time, files, dependencies, and risk
Run pre-task gate validation to check requirements completeness and dependency readiness
Detect when stuck after 3 failed attempts and trigger escalation workflows
Break down Level 4-5 complex tasks into manageable Level 1-3 subtasks
Validate requirements completeness across functional and technical dimensions
Document assumptions and track quality gate status in context
limitations: Does not execute any code or run tests automatically
Does not access project files to estimate complexity automatically
Does not enforce gates in the host system without integration
Requires the AI agent to manually complete gate check templates

use_cases.title: Prevent scope creep
use_cases.description: Use complexity scoring to identify tasks that need breakdown before work begins

use_cases.title: Govern agent behavior
use_cases.description: Implement quality gates that prevent agents from proceeding with incomplete requirements

use_cases.title: Reduce wasted effort
use_cases.description: Stop and ask questions before building the wrong solution

prompt_templates.title: Quick complexity check
prompt_templates.prompt: Assess the complexity of this task on a 1-5 scale using the quality-gates skill. Consider lines of code, time estimate, number of files, dependencies, and unknowns. What level is it?

prompt_templates.title: Full gate validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a complete quality gate check for this task using /skills/quality-gates/templates/gate-check-template.md. List critical questions that must be answered and check all dependencies.

prompt_templates.title: Stuck escalation
prompt_templates.prompt: I have tried 3 approaches and none worked. Use the quality-gates skill to create an escalation document. Document what was tried, what failed, and what guidance I need.

prompt_templates.title: Break down complex task
prompt_templates.prompt: This task is too complex. Break it down into Level 1-3 subtasks using the quality-gates complexity breakdown approach. Create dependencies and estimates for each subtask.

output_examples.input: Add user authentication to the application
output: - Dependencies: 4-6 (auth library, database, sessions, API endpoints)
Blocking conditions: Requires clarification on auth method (OAuth vs JWT vs session), user roles and permissions, existing user model structure
Gate Status: BLOCKED - Need 3+ questions answered before proceeding

best_practices: Always run a gate check before starting Level 3+ tasks
Document every assumption when proceeding with a WARNING status
Escalate after 3 failed attempts instead of continuing to try the same approach
anti_patterns: Skipping gate checks for simple-looking tasks that turn out to be complex
Proceeding with BLOCKED status to make progress
Not tracking attempt counts and continuing to retry the same approach

faq.question: Does quality-gates integrate with my existing AI setup?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill provides templates and decision frameworks that work with any AI system. Integration requires manually applying the gate checks.

faq.question: What complexity level triggers mandatory breakdown?
faq.answer: Tasks rated Level 4 or 5 must be broken down into Level 1-3 subtasks before proceeding. This prevents tackling overly complex work directly.

faq.question: How many unanswered questions trigger a block?
faq.answer: More than 3 unanswered critical questions triggers a BLOCKED status. This prevents proceeding with fundamentally incomplete requirements.

faq.question: Is any data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: No. This skill contains only documentation and templates. No network requests, file access, or external communications occur.

faq.question: What happens when I am stuck on a task?
faq.answer: After 3 failed attempts, the skill triggers escalation. Document what was tried, why it failed, and what guidance you need. Escalate to the user.

faq.question: How does this differ from code review tools?
faq.answer: Quality gates operate before work begins, focusing on requirements and complexity. Code review tools examine completed work. They complement each other.
